title: ‘Splosion Man creator Twisted Pixel splits from Microsoft
text:
‘Splosion Man creator Twisted Pixel splits from Microsoft 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Developer Twisted Pixel, creator of games like 'Splosion Man and Comic Jumper, has "returned to its indie roots" this week, announcing that ...
